name: A Week at Bottle Beach
description:
You've rented a beach cottage to relax and rest, but the ocean keeps sending you mysterious bottles with doubly mysterious messages inside them.

Use the arrow buttons to play!

This is my first Bitsy game!

-

Lovely ocean sounds from zapsplat.com

Thank you to EditorAndPerks, Querencia, Holysocks, ellasnotebook, mellifera, and whatchamacallit for helping me write the original messages.

And thank you to anyone who has submitted messages! If you don't have a QR code reader (or if it's just not working for some reason), here is the link to submit messages.
